Changelog

NEWS 2021.11.17 — New publication

My book chapter on tree variable selection for microbiome data is published.

NEWS 2021.08.23 — Fall semester begins

The BST 625 class is in person/zoom. I teach from Oct 11 to Dec 1.

NEWS 2021.08.21 — I release 2.1 version of metavcov

I develop and maintain the R package.

NEWS 2021.08.13 — We release randomForestSRC website

I develop and maintain the website and coauthor its 13 vignettes.

NEWS 2017.03.29 — The birthday of metavcov

I develop and maintain the R package.

NEWS 2012.10.31 — The birthday of randomForestSRC is Halloween!!

My PhD advisor Hemant Ishwaran develop the R package with Udaya B. Kogalur.
